system_coder: Antwort ausschließlich als gültiges JSON gemäß dem vorgegebenen Schema. Keine Erklärungen, keine Freitexte, keine zusätzlichen Felder. Wenn Werte unbekannt sind, verwende null, leere Arrays oder 'unknown' (wo passend).

user_coder.de:
Normalisiere die folgende Rohantwort in das Zielschema. Behalte die Ausgabesprache identisch zu "language".
Regeln:
- Keine Fakten erfinden. Wenn keine Belege vorliegen, setze "evidence": [].
- "sentiment_label": positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown (ableiten, sonst unknown).
- "aspect_scores.narrative": extrahiere 3–5 neutrale Kernaussagen (kurz, sachlich).
- "aspect_scores.sentiment": falls ableitbar in [-1..1], sonst null.
- "sources": Domains aus evidence (oder leer).
- "confidence": low|medium|high (ohne Belege typ. medium; mit mehreren Belegen ≥ medium).
- Übernimm Metafelder: brand/topic/market/language/profile/intent/variant.
Rohantwort:
<<<
{RAW_TEXT}
>>>
Belege (falls vorhanden):
<<<
{CSE_ITEMS}
>>>

Gib NUR valides JSON zurück.
Schema (Schlüssel, zulässige Werte & Hinweise):
{
  "brand": "<string>",
  "topic": "<string>",
  "market": "<string>",
  "language": "<de|fr|it|rm|en>",
  "profile": "<CHATGPT_NO_SEARCH|CHATGPT_SEARCH_AUTO|GOOGLE_OVERVIEW>",
  "intent": <int>,
  "variant": <int>,
  "inclusion": <true|false|null>,
  "sentiment_label": "positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown",
  "aspect_scores": {
    "visibility": <float|null>,
    "sentiment": <float|-1..1|null>,
    "narrative": ["<claim1>","<claim2>","<claim3>"],
    "risk_flags": ["<flag1>","<flag2>"],
    "sources": ["<domain1>","<domain2>"]
  },
  "evidence": [{
    "title": "<string>",
    "url": "<string>",
    "domain": "<string>",
    "domain_type": "news_national|news_regional|trade_media|blog|corporate|ngo|gov|academic|social|forum|aggregator|price_compare|other",
    "country": "DE|CH|AT|FR|IT|...|unknown",
    "published_at": "<ISO8601|optional>",
    "discovered_at": "<ISO8601>",
    "age_days": <int|null>,
    "freshness_bucket": "today|≤7d|≤30d|≤90d|≤365d|>365d|unknown"
  }],
  "freshness_index": <0..1>,
  "freshness_known_pct": <0..1>,
  "run_meta": {
    "run_timestamp": "<ISO8601>",
    "provider": "openai|google",
    "model_version": "<string>",
    "search_params": {"n": 5, "hl": "{LANG}", "gl": "{MARKET}"}
  },
  "confidence": "low|medium|high"
}
user_coder.fr:
Normalise la réponse brute dans le schéma cible. Garde la langue de sortie identique à "language".
Règles :
- N'invente aucun fait. Si aucune source n'est fournie, mets "evidence": [].
- "sentiment_label": positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown (déduire si possible, sinon unknown).
- "aspect_scores.narrative": extrais 3–5 énoncés clés neutres (brefs, factuels).
- "aspect_scores.sentiment": si déductible, valeur dans [-1..1], sinon null.
- "sources": domaines à partir de evidence (ou vide).
- "confidence": low|medium|high (sans sources: souvent medium ; avec plusieurs sources: ≥ medium).
- Recopie brand/topic/market/language/profile/intent/variant.
Réponse brute :
<<<
{RAW_TEXT}
>>>
Sources (si disponibles) :
<<<
{CSE_ITEMS}
>>>

user_coder.it:
Normalizza la risposta grezza allo schema di destinazione. Mantieni la lingua di uscita uguale a "language".
Regole:
- Non inventare fatti. Se non ci sono fonti, usa "evidence": [].
- "sentiment_label": positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown (deduci, altrimenti unknown).
- "aspect_scores.narrative": estrai 3–5 affermazioni chiave neutrali (brevi, oggettive).
- "aspect_scores.sentiment": se deducibile, in [-1..1], altrimenti null.
- "sources": domini da evidence (oppure vuoto).
- "confidence": low|medium|high (senza fonti in genere medium; con più fonti ≥ medium).
- Copia brand/topic/market/language/profile/intent/variant.
Risposta grezza:
<<<
{RAW_TEXT}
>>>
Fonti (se presenti):
<<<
{CSE_ITEMS}
>>>

user_coder.rm:
Normalisescha la resposta brutta tenor il schema da destinaziun. Mantain la lingua da sortida medema sco "language".
Reglas:
- Na inventescha nagins fats. Sche naginas funtaunas stattan a disposiziun, scriva "evidence": [].
- "sentiment_label": positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown (deducescha, autramain unknown).
- "aspect_scores.narrative": extrai 3–5 decleraziuns centralas neutrales (curtas, objectivas).
- "aspect_scores.sentiment": sch'igl è deducibel, valur en [-1..1], autramain null.
- "sources": domins or da evidence (u vid).
- "confidence": low|medium|high (senza funtaunas: savens medium; cun pliras funtaunas: ≥ medium).
- Copia brand/topic/market/language/profile/intent/variant.
Resposta brutta:
<<<
{RAW_TEXT}
>>>
Funtaunas (sche existan):
<<<
{CSE_ITEMS}
>>>

user_coder.en:
Normalize the raw answer to the target schema. Keep the output language identical to "language".
Rules:
- Do not invent facts. If no sources are available, set "evidence": [].
- "sentiment_label": positive|neutral|negative|ambivalent|unknown (infer if possible, otherwise unknown).
- "aspect_scores.narrative": extract 3–5 neutral key statements (short, factual).
- "aspect_scores.sentiment": if inferrable, in [-1..1], else null.
- "sources": domains from evidence (or empty).
- "confidence": low|medium|high (without sources: typically medium; with several sources: ≥ medium).
- Carry through brand/topic/market/language/profile/intent/variant.
Raw answer:
<<<
{RAW_TEXT}
>>>
Sources (if any):
<<<
{CSE_ITEMS}
>>>
